00034 #include <tclap/CmdLine.h>
00035 
00036 #include "itkImageFileReader.h"
00037 #include "itkImageFileWriter.h"
00038 
00039 #include "itkImage.h"
00040 #include "itkConstrainedValueDifferenceImageFilter.h"
00041 
00042 #include "../Code/Denoising/btkNLMTool.h"
00043 
00044 #include <vector>
00045 
00046 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00047 {
00048 
00049   try {
00050 
00051     TCLAP::CmdLine cmd("Command description message", ' ', "1.0", true);
00052 
00053     TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> inputImageArg("i","image_file","input image file (short)",true,"","string");
00054     cmd.add( inputImageArg );
00055     TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> outputImageArg("o","output_file","output image file (short)",true,"","string");
00056     cmd.add( outputImageArg );
00057     TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> inputMaskArg("m","mask_file","filename of the mask image",false,"","string");
00058     cmd.add( inputMaskArg );
00059     TCLAP::ValueArg< float > paddingArg("p","pad","padding value (used if no mask image is provided, default is -1)",false,-1,"float");
00060     cmd.add( paddingArg );
00061     TCLAP::ValueArg< int > hwnArg("","hwn","patch half size (default is 1)",false,1,"int");
00062     cmd.add( hwnArg );
00063     TCLAP::ValueArg< int > hwvsArg("","hwvs","half size of the volume search area, i.e. the spatial bandwidth (default is 5)",false,5,"int");
00064     cmd.add( hwvsArg );
00065     TCLAP::ValueArg< float > betaArg("b","beta","beta: smoothing parameter (high beta produces smoother result, default is 1)",false,1,"float");
00066     cmd.add( betaArg );
00067     TCLAP::ValueArg< int > blockArg("","block","0: pointwise, 1: blockwise, 2: fast blockwise (default is 1)",false,1,"int");
00068     cmd.add( blockArg );
00069     TCLAP::ValueArg< int > centerArg("c","center","weight of the central patch (possible value: 0, 1, -1 (max)) (default is -1)",false,-1,"int");
00070     cmd.add( centerArg );
00071     TCLAP::ValueArg< int > optimizedArg("","opt","optimized mode (use mean and standard deviation of patches) (0: no, 1: yes) (default is 1)",false,1,"int");
00072     cmd.add( optimizedArg );
00073     TCLAP::ValueArg< float > lowerMeanThresholdArg("","lmt","lower mean threshold (0.95 by default) -- for optimized mode only",false,0.95,"float");
00074     cmd.add( lowerMeanThresholdArg );
00075     TCLAP::ValueArg< float > lowerVarianceThresholdArg("","lvt","lower variance threshold (0.5 by default) -- for optimized mode only",false,0.5,"float");
00076     cmd.add( lowerVarianceThresholdArg );
00077     TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> outputDifferenceImageArg("d","difference_file","filename of the difference image",false,"","string");
00078     cmd.add( outputDifferenceImageArg );
00079  
00080     // Parse the args.
00081     cmd.parse( argc, argv );
00082 
00083 
00084     // Get the value parsed by each arg.
00085     std::string input_file       = inputImageArg.getValue();
00086     std::string output_file      = outputImageArg.getValue();
00087 
00088     std::string mask_file        = inputMaskArg.getValue();
00089     float padding                = paddingArg.getValue();
00090     int hwn                      = hwnArg.getValue();
00091     int hwvs                     = hwvsArg.getValue();
00092     float beta                   = betaArg.getValue();
00093     int block                    = blockArg.getValue();
00094     int center                   = centerArg.getValue();
00095     int optimized                = optimizedArg.getValue();
00096     float lowerMeanThreshold     = lowerMeanThresholdArg.getValue();
00097     float lowerVarianceThreshold = lowerVarianceThresholdArg.getValue();
00098     std::string difference_file  = outputDifferenceImageArg.getValue();
00099 
00100     //ITK declaration
00101     typedef short PixelType;
00102     const   unsigned int        Dimension = 3;
00103     typedef itk::Image< PixelType, Dimension >    ImageType; //same type for input and output
00104     typedef ImageType::Pointer ImagePointer;
00105 
00106     typedef itk::ImageFileReader< ImageType >  ReaderType;
00107     typedef itk::ImageFileWriter< ImageType >  WriterType;
00108 
00109     //Read the image
00110     ReaderType::Pointer reader = ReaderType::New();
00111     reader->SetFileName( input_file );
00112     reader->Update();
00113     ImagePointer inputImage = reader->GetOutput();
00114 
00115     ImagePointer outputImage = ImageType::New();
00116 
00117     ImagePointer maskImage;
00118 
00119     btkNLMTool<PixelType> myTool;
00120 
00121     myTool.SetInput(inputImage);
00122 
00123     if (mask_file != ""){               //reading the mask image
00124       ReaderType::Pointer maskReader = ReaderType::New();
00125       maskReader->SetFileName( mask_file );
00126       maskReader->Update();
00127       maskImage = maskReader->GetOutput();
00128       myTool.SetMaskImage(maskImage);
00129     }
00130     else                                 //creating a mask image using the padding value
00131       myTool.SetPaddingValue(padding);
00132 
00133     myTool.SetPatchSize(hwn);
00134     myTool.SetSpatialBandwidth(hwvs);
00135     myTool.SetSmoothing(beta);
00136     myTool.SetCentralPointStrategy(center);
00137     myTool.SetBlockwiseStrategy(block);
00138     myTool.SetOptimizationStrategy(optimized);
00139     myTool.SetLowerThresholds(lowerMeanThreshold, lowerVarianceThreshold);
00140 
00141 
00142     myTool.ComputeOutput();
00143 
00144     myTool.GetOutput(outputImage);
00145 
00146     //Write the result
00147     WriterType::Pointer writer = WriterType::New();
00148     writer->SetFileName( output_file );
00149     writer->SetInput( outputImage );
00150     writer->Update();
00151 
00152     if (difference_file != ""){
00153       itk::ConstrainedValueDifferenceImageFilter<ImageType,ImageType,ImageType>::Pointer diffFilter = itk::ConstrainedValueDifferenceImageFilter<ImageType,ImageType,ImageType>::New();
00154 
00155       diffFilter->SetInput1( inputImage );
00156       diffFilter->SetInput2( outputImage );
00157 
00158       WriterType::Pointer diffWriter = WriterType::New();
00159       diffWriter->SetFileName( difference_file );
00160       diffWriter->SetInput( diffFilter->GetOutput() );
00161       diffWriter->Update();
00162     }
00163 
00164     return 1;
00165 
00166   } catch (TCLAP::ArgException &e)  // catch any exceptions
00167   { std::cerr << "error: " << e.error() << " for arg " << e.argId() << std::endl; }
00168 
00169 }
